content: Yellow calls for an immediate ceasefire and expresses support for UN-mediated peace talks between Orange and Purple.
Yellow expresses grave concern over the attack and stands ready to offer our services as a neutral party to help facilitate a resolution through open dialogue and diplomacy.

While acknowledging security concerns, Yellow asks that Orange exercise restraint and agree to a ceasefire to prevent further escalation and loss of life. We offer to help facilitate peaceful negotiations.

Yellow reiterates our call for an immediate ceasefire and expresses hope that Purple and Orange will agree to UN-mediated peace talks to resolve their issues diplomatically with respect for sovereignty and rule of law.

Yellow reiterates our call for an immediate ceasefire and expresses hope that direct talks between Purple and Orange will soon commence to find a resolution respecting sovereignty and security for all sides.

Yellow welcomes Orange's ceasefire and calls on all parties to seize this opportunity for constructive engagement. We reiterate our offer to host direct negotiations between Purple and Orange aiming for a sustainable peace agreement.

content: Yellow welcomes signs of de-escalation and calls on all parties to remain engaged in open dialogue.
We are encouraged by your commitment to negotiations and reiterate our offer to facilitate direct talks with Orange.
We appreciate your announcement and ask if you are willing to engage in direct negotiations with Purple facilitated by Yellow to establish a lasting peace.

Yellow welcomes ongoing diplomatic efforts and calls on all parties to remain engaged in open dialogue. Progress requires patience, understanding and commitment to resolving issues peacefully through respect for sovereignty and rule of law.

We are encouraged by your openness to negotiations. Please let us know if and when you feel ready to engage in direct talks with Orange, as Yellow remains ready to facilitate in a neutral and constructive manner.

We appreciate your commitment to diplomacy. Please inform us if and when you feel ready to engage in direct negotiations with Purple, as Yellow stands ready to support in a neutral and constructive role.

Yellow welcomes ongoing restraint and calls for all parties to remain focused on open communication through diplomatic channels. Progress will come through patience, understanding and commitment to resolving issues respectfully as envisioned by our shared humanity.

We appreciate your openness to negotiations. Please let us know if direct talks with Orange would be helpful, as Yellow remains ready to support in a neutral and constructive manner whenever all parties feel prepared.

We thank you for your commitment to diplomacy. Please inform us if direct negotiations with Purple would be useful, as Yellow pledges to facilitate in a neutral and impartial role whenever both sides feel ready.

Yellow welcomes ongoing diplomatic efforts and calls for continued restraint, open communication, and commitment to resolving issues through respectful negotiations upholding rule of law and human rights for all.
